p: D. kotschyi showed good cytotoxic action towards the human tumor cell line. Based on the cytotoxic activity obtained from MTT assay, the IC50 values for HeLa and lymphocyte cells were calculated to be 26.4 μg/m1 and 4266.7 μg/m1, respectively. The IC50 showed higher cytotoxicity of the oil towards the human tumor cell line in comparison with healthy human cells requirement.
